definition.content:
**[StreamNative](https://www.streamnative.com/)**  provides an enterprise-grade messaging platform built on Apache Pulsar, offering scalable real-time data streaming with multi-tenancy, geo-replication, and cloud integration.

This Kafka Connect dashboard track records polled/written to Kafka, task offset completions, time for reading/sending records, and JVM resource management for system insights.

For more information, see the [StreamNative Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/streamnative/).

**Note**:
- The dashboard widgets display the latest metric values captured on Kafka connect statistics.

**Tip**:
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.

definition.title: Total Source Task Records Polled by Connector
Time Taken To Fetch Batch Records over time
Task Batch Average Size over time
Task Offset Commit Average Time Overview
Task Offset Commit Attempt over time
Active Source Average Record Count over time

Time Spent In JVM Garbage Collector
